list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a fruit consisting of a hard or tough shell around an edible kernel.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he was cracking nuts with his teeth
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta bị nứt hạt với răng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a small flat piece of metal or other material, typically square or hexagonal, with a threaded hole through it for screwing on to a bolt as a fastener.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: fix the new pipe and tighten the nuts
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Sửa ống mới và siết chặt các loại hạt

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she would have written me off as a time-wasting nut
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: cô ấy sẽ viết cho tôi như một hạt lãng phí thời gian

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the fixed ridge on the neck of a stringed instrument over which the strings pass.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the positioning allows the strings a straight path over the nut
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Vị trí cho phép các chuỗi một đường thẳng trên đai ốc

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: in autumn children would go nutting
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Trong mùa thu trẻ em sẽ đến nutting
